entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Service does not start if process name is specified in Service attribute #23593
  • CTRL+ALT+L #23591
  • Make Typed `SetBinding()` method generic so that the `BindableProperty` need not be prefixed with the type name #23590
  • SearchBar: Inconsistent behavior - Confusion and request to reopen issue 9092 #23588
  • *.appinstaller - outdated schema #23583
  • SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored when SwipeItem Background color os set. #23581
  • [iOS] Entry not allow to scroll when keyboard is open #23580
  • IWebView.Source has no setter #23579
  • Behavior bindable property with DynamicResource not supported? #23578
  • Workload 8.0.61 breaks Mono interpreter on MacCatalyst. #23577
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 6] SplashScreen icon is randomly left out of the package #23576
  • Gradient never returns to the correct colour #23575
  • Memory Leak When updating <image /> Image Source from View model [Observable Property] using memory Stream. 60 fps Byte[] to the view #23574
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #23573
  • MAUI default project template Windows platform creation completed and running failed #23571
  • MAUI Windows Picker scroll bar doesn't appear when there are 14 items #23570
  • Nunits/Xunits support only .net8.0 and cannot be written specifically for either .net8.0 android or ios #23568
  • Unable to hide NavigationBar #23567

Closed

  • [Windows] No application icon in the titlebar #23572
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL) in tid 25847 (.NET TP Worker) - Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22812
  • MauiSplashScreen when setting the color to #FFFFFF and #FFF #23361

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few more template ampersand cases #23592
    area-templates
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23585
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #23586
  • [darc] Pin darc version as workaround #23584

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.4.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
